Docs.summary: Searchability meta-data for an activity.

remarks.para: Searchability meta-data for an activity. Only applications that search other applications should need to use this class. See Searchable Configuration for more information about declaring searchability meta-data for your application.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the resource id of the hint text.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ImeOptions As ImeAction
public: property Android::Views::InputMethods::ImeAction ImeOptions { Android::Views::InputMethods::ImeAction get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the input method options specified in the searchable attributes.
Docs.value: the input type

remarks.para: Gets the input method options specified in the searchable attributes. This will default to EditorInfo#IME_ACTION_GO if not specified (which is appropriate for a search box).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputType As InputTypes
public: property Android::Text::InputTypes InputType { Android::Text::InputTypes get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the input type as specified in the searchable attributes.
Docs.value: the input type

remarks.para: Gets the input type as specified in the searchable attributes. This will default to InputType#TYPE_CLASS_TEXT if not specified (which is appropriate for free text input).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SuggestAuthority As String
public: property System::String ^ SuggestAuthority { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the search suggestion content provider authority.
Docs.value: The search suggestions authority, or null if not set.

remarks.para: Gets the search suggestion content provider authority.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SuggestIntentAction As String
public: property System::String ^ SuggestIntentAction { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the optional intent action for use with these suggestions.
Docs.value: The default intent action, or null if not set.

remarks.para:
Gets the optional intent action for use with these suggestions. This is useful if all intents will have the same action (e.g. android.content.Intent#ACTION_VIEW)
This can be overriden in any given suggestion using the column SearchManager#SUGGEST_COLUMN_INTENT_ACTION.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SuggestIntentData As String
public: property System::String ^ SuggestIntentData { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the optional intent data for use with these suggestions.
Docs.value: The default intent data, or null if not set.

remarks.para:
Gets the optional intent data for use with these suggestions. This is useful if all intents will have similar data URIs, but you'll likely need to provide a specific ID as well via the column SearchManager#SUGGEST_COLUMN_INTENT_DATA_ID, which will be appended to the intent data URI.
This can be overriden in any given suggestion using the column SearchManager#SUGGEST_COLUMN_INTENT_DATA.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
